name: City Atlas
description: The City Atlas is a project by Geografia exploring spatial patterns across metropolitan areas. It is designed to illustrate current and future employment and service accessibility.

name: Port Phillip
description: This visualisation shows forecasted changes in population for the City of Port Phillip at the statistical area 1 (SA1) level.

name: Victowns
description: VicTowns provides a score-card for Victoria's rural and regional towns. Each score measures access to important facilities, services and economic opportunity.
